actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to remove the limitation on dues for U.S. membership in the International Criminal Police Organization.

summary.text: Removes the limitation on dues for United States membership in the International Criminal Police Organization. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to the International Criminal Police Organization the unpaid balance of the dues for calendar years 1975 and 1976.

titles.title: A bill to remove the limitation on dues for U.S. membership in the International Criminal Police Organization.
